name: Super Roll (BD Games)
description:
Super Roll is an addictive game that will challenge your reflexes on another level. Your goal is to control the cube and avoid all 

the obstacles and falling down the floor. However, it is not as easy as it sounds!

Don’t let anything distract you as you are just a second away from losing. There will be holes in the floor, and various other obstacles 

that are very hard to pass. Every turn you take will take you close to the deadly traps.

Enjoy the soothing sound and the colorful background of the game, but remember to focus on the cube as it will keep rolling. Act as fast as 

you can and make rational decisions to get better scores.

Features

- Colorful design that attracts everyone.

- Unlimited Gameplay.

- Various obstacles to keep the game interesting.

- Gradual Increase in the speed to make the game hard as you progress.

- Soothing background sound.

- Fast paced and addictive Gameplay.
